about_the_game:
Join a thrilling adventure where friendship, love, care, and hard work help you bring back harmony. Restore the lost connection between humans and dragons and transform the abandoned world into a place full of happiness and kindness. Grow crops, gather valuable resources, take care of adorable dragons, and help the townsfolk rediscover their long-forgotten joy.



Meet the friendly, playful, and kind-hearted dragons, each with its own special traits. These dragons can sense people's needs and use their unique powers. If you take good care of them, these amazing creatures will become your loyal friends and helpful buddies on the farm. Make your dragons happy by giving them love and playtime!



Your dragon helpers will aid you in transforming your grandfather's old farm into a haven of safety and support. Turn this abandoned place into an oasis where joy and friendship flourish. Cultivate crops, harvest resources, produce valuable goods, and help the town and nature recover. Watch as the land is revitalized and the world brightens up thanks to your nurturing care.



The farm isn't too far from the darkened city. The folks there are gloomy and grumpy, having lost faith in joy and friendship. Deep down, though, they yearn for happiness. With your assistance, they'll start to change, showing a completely different side of themselves. Together with the dragons, help the townsfolk rekindle warm memories and revive their zest for life as you discover each resident's touching stories.



Explore new biomes and revitalize them by eliminating corruption to bring them back to life. Examine the characteristics of each new biome and leverage them to your benefit. Watch as the darkness retreats and feel how, through your hard work, the world regains its former beauty!



The world of Dragon Shelter is bursting with vibrant colors and extraordinary creatures. Every nook and cranny of the adventure holds the promise of incredible discoveries and joy. Set out on your exploration, and who knows, you might stumble upon something exceptionally amusing along the way!

Be a part of our friendly community!
